body:
Comment 8 by **stephenm@golang.org**: 
Just checking: did you build your source code with:

GOARM=5

in the environment variables?

5g generates code that uses arm floating point instructions not present in the arm11
core in the N810. The "fconstd" instruction is one such instruction. With GOARM=5, the
generated code will use floating point emulation instead.
_Owner changed to **stephenm@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
